name: Escape The Zoo!
description:
ESCAPE THE ZOO

Escape The Zoo! is PC-only, competitive shared-screen 2D board game where two players compete to reach the end of the board first and win the game, made using Unity2D. Throughout the board , there are random tiles that can spawn a  minigame, help you to advance in the game, or disadvantage you from winning the game.

Features

  • 5 unique and rewarding minigames
  • Cute animal avatars
  • Hats. Lots and lots of hats
  • pixel art graphics
  • funky retro music

Can you Escape the Zoo?
